answers.answer: If i were you hun, I would call my doc and make an appointment.  Its better to be safe then sorry.  I mean alot of times when you have a baby regardless if it is c-section or natural your body can take along time to bounce back to normal.  It sounds like you had some complacations with your pregnancy so it could just be your body ajusting back to normal.  I would call your doctor and make an appoitnment its ALWAYS better to be safe then sorry.

question: i had a c-section in june and ever since my period has returned ive started on the 26-27th of every month but for the past3 ive been starting 5 days earlier every month and my periods are lighter and with my last pregnancy i had preeclampsia at 6 months and hellp syndrome my b/p was 160/105. ive taken 3 pregnancy test in the past 3 months and they are all nagative. can anyone tell me what the hell is going on? not to mention im bloated, sleep more, eat more and i get very irritable. plus back pain and i pee alot but i dont feel pregnant so whats the problem? By the way i have ITP. can someone PLEASE help me!!!!!!
title: can some one help!!
